optional *work a round of single_crochet around the neckline and by the waistline make 1sc in each of the stitch *work a round of single_crochet around the sleeve edge make 2 scs in side st and single_crochet in between sts congratulations you have finished your simple rectangle shrug i will be happy to see all your makes please tag me @knotedthread on instagram add your project on ravelry too knotedthread please leave you feedback on etsy 7
